text:
M. S. Novik
February 23, 19$$
FtU 2 4 Idbh
Harry?
i
Just back to find your letter of the 11th
and the enclosed from Seattle,
Even though the station in Seattle is oper¬
ated by the Board of Education, the labor move¬
ment in the area shows wisdom and farsightedness
in permitting the TV station to operate completely
by students and university personnel, I*m happy
if you’re happy and they’re happy.
The only criticism I have is with your ”iiot
all areas are so fortunate’’. I am sure you don’t
mean it the way it sounds. Actually they are for¬
tunate because of their university set-up
MSN:ck
